review: Easy set up and installation.  Already have a Prime and Netflix account and they were easy to load.  Don't be fooled there is an outside power source needed.  Comes with a plug and about 4 feet of cable.  I was thinking it was more of a USB powered device without a separate power supply.  Something similar to a flashdrive.  But even so, we are very happy with the device.  Easy to setup, easy to navigate.
author: chris studnicki

review: I have the amazon fire TV in my living room and with the amazon fire TV stick in my master bedroom I get to enjoy all the programs upstairs and downstairs
